NCAA Basketball Championships (Men)
lead_paragraph: The last time North Carolina played an East Regional game in New Jersey, the man who played their mascot was struck and killed by a car. His legacy lives on.
snippet: The last time North Carolina played an East Regional game in New Jersey, the man who played their mascot was struck and killed by a car. His legacy lives on.
